snippet.title: Blood of Mehran - Coming Soon! | Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
✨ WISHLIST NOW ✨

- Steam: ►https://bit.ly/bomstm
- Epic Games Store: ►https://bit.ly/bomepc
- PlayStation: ►https://bit.ly/bompsn5
- XBOX: ►https://bit.ly/bomxb

----------

Prepare for an epic journey of vengeance and redemption in Blood of Mehran, an action-packed hack-and-slash adventure coming to Steam, Epic Games Store, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X|S!

Inspired by the timeless tales of One Thousand and One Nights, Blood of Mehran follows the legendary warrior Mehran, whose peaceful life is destroyed by the ambitions of a cruel king. Haunted by his dark past and the demons that plague his mind, Mehran must once again take up his sword and fight against human and supernatural enemies in a quest for justice.

----------
FOLLOW US:
Find out more ►https://bit.ly/bomlinks

Blowfish Studios Twitter ► http://bit.ly/2PkYmHq
Blowfish Studios Facebook ► http://bit.ly/2LGKwNr
Blowfish Studios Instagram ► http://bit.ly/2MDhRxW
